title: Learning on Modelling System for Agricultural Impacts of Climate Change (MOSAICC)

groups.name: climate-change-adaptation
groups.description: Climate change threatens our ability to ensure global food security, eradicate poverty and achieve sustainable development. Greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions from human activity and livestock are a significant driver of climate change, trapping heat in the earth's atmosphere and triggering global warming.
groups.title: Climate change adaptation and resilience

name: learning-on-modelling-system-for-agricultural-impacts-of-climate-change-mosaicc

resources.description: This brochure gives an overview of the MOSAICC platform and the ongoing work to develop it. It includes case studies of countries that have used the platform including Morocco, the Philippines and Peru.
resources.name: MOSAICC brochure - A modelling system for the assessment of agricultural impacts of climate change

notes: MOSAICC is a system of models and utilities designed to carry out inter-disciplinary climate change impact assessment on agriculture, water resources, forestry, economy through simulations at national level. It uses an innovative approach that integrates five components to assess the impact of climate change and comprises documentation on methods and tools, as well as user manual and sample data.

organization.name: fao
organization.title: FAO
organization.description: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
